headline.main: NEW FRENCH LAW HELD UNITY MOVE; Aim of Labor Charter Called Collaboration Between the Employers and Workers PLAN FOR EXCESS PROFITS Minister Says Funds Should Go to Laborers to Aid Them to Get Private Property

lead_paragraph: VICHY, Nov. 9 -- The new French Labor Charter has been the subject of numerous comments in the press. It has formed also the topic of official declarations by three different Ministers. All insist on the social character of the law.
abstract: laws increasing State employes pay and pensions and reforming local finance systems pub
snippet: VICHY, Nov. 9 -- The new French Labor Charter has been the subject of numerous comments in the press. It has formed also the topic of official declarations by three different Ministers. All insist on the social character of the law....

byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES
